mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Lightburn, Joseph Andrew Jackson to Hall, John
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lightburn, Joseph Andrew Jackson
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Col Jno. Hall Wheel 186. By Telegraph from Point Pleasant 18 1862. I have just arrived my command will be in tonight, I brought away all my artillery wagons and horses men not demoralized JAJ Lightburn Col Comdg 22w98&98col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lightburn, Joseph Andrew Jackson
Point Pleasant, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Hall, John
